entry.title: Wolf Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

Another Southwestern American icon, this howling wolf is a favorite for Indian tribes everywhere and for the animal lover in all of us!

  • Sterling Silver Plated 40 Mils
  • Copyrighted
  • Three Dimensional
  • Made Right Here in The Northeast. U.S.A.
  • Charm Trail Favorite
